mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pay_pay_transdtl_nonf( MSGID, PAYDATE, PAYTIME, PAYSERNO, PKGNO, DRCT, TRADESTATUS, SENDERDATETIME, INSTGDRCTPTY, INSTDDRCTPTY, OPTERATIONTYPE, PROCSTATUS, REJECTCODE, REJECTINFO, TLRNO, REMARK, MESSAGECONTEXT, LASTUPDATE, LASTUPTIME ) VALUE ( #{msgId}, #{payDate}, #{payTime}, #{paySerNo}, #{pkgNo}, #{drct}, #{tradeStatus}, #{senderDateTime}, #{instgDrctPty}, #{instdDrctPty}, #{opterationType}, #{procStatus}, #{rejectCode}, #{rejectInfo}, #{tlrNo}, #{remark}, #{messageContext}, #{lastUpDate}, #{lastUpTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE pay_pay_transdtl_nonf SET PAYDATE = #{payDate}, PAYTIME = #{payTime}, PAYSERNO = #{paySerNo}, PKGNO = #{pkgNo}, DRCT = #{drct}, TRADESTATUS = #{tradeStatus}, SENDERDATETIME = #{senderDateTime}, INSTGDRCTPTY = #{instgDrctPty}, INSTDDRCTPTY = #{instdDrctPty}, OPTERATIONTYPE = #{opterationType}, PROCSTATUS = #{procStatus}, REJECTCODE = #{rejectCode}, REJECTINFO = #{rejectInfo}, TLRNO = #{tlrNo}, REMARK = #{remark}, MESSAGECONTEXT = #{messageContext}, LASTUPDATE = #{lastUpDate}, LASTUPTIME = #{lastUpTime} WHERE MSGID = #{msgId}
